text: seonjijaga jeonlipum-eul hoenglyeonghaneun il-eun iss-eul su eobsnola. jeonlipum-eul hoenglyeonghan ja issdamyeon simpan-ui nal geuneun geuga hoenglyeonghan jeonlipumgwa hamkke (hananimkkelo) oge doel geos-ila. geu hu modeun ineun jasin-ui haeng-wileul namgim-eobs-i bosangbad-eul geos-imyeo geudeul-eun budanghi dalueojiji anh-eul geos-ila
